abstract: As newlyweds, Queenie Dong, and her husband, Zee Zheng, helped Mr. Zheng’s parents run a restaurant in the Bronx. A year and a half ago, they opened Chuan Tian Xia in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: As newlyweds, Queenie Dong, and her husband, Zee Zheng, helped Mr. Zheng’s parents run a restaurant in the Bronx. A year and a half ago, they opened Chuan Tian Xia in Sunset Park, Brooklyn.
